A student rides his bike on East Polluck Road on campus on Thursday Sept PERIOD   PERIOD

The League of American Bicyclists named Penn State a goldlevel Bicycle Friendly University in recognition of the universities promotion of  on campus according to Penn State News PERIOD

The Bicycle Friendly University program includes  colleges and universities according to Penn State News PERIOD The program also awards certifications to communities and businesses as well PERIOD

The Centre region was named silverlevel bicyclefriendly in December of  PERIOD

According to Penn StateTransportation Services Sustainable Transportation Program Coordinator Cecily Zhu the university originally received a bronze designation in  PERIOD

This summer Penn State is opening a bike workshop space in the West Parking Deck PERIOD The university also has covered bike parking an interactive bike map bike light giveaways and bike safety workshops according to Penn State News PERIOD
